name.en: Special topics-guidance of immunotoxicology paper reading and presentation
name.ch: 專題研究：免疫毒理學之科學論文導讀與報告

goal.ch:
1. 免疫毒理科學論文導讀。
To learn reading scientific papers related to immunotoxicology.
2. 瞭解免疫毒理的學術研究方法，學術文獻資料收集。
To understand the academic research methods of immunotoxicology, and literature data collection. 
3. 學習論文與報告格式與寫作技巧。
To learn report format and writing skills
